o3smeasures.util

Class JavaParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • o3smeasures.util.JavaParser

  • public class JavaParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements a parser with AST generation and visitor support. The AST records the source code structure, javadoc and comments. It is also possible to change the AST nodes or create new ones to modify the source code.
    Since:
    13/07/2014
    Author:
    Mariana Azevedo
